name: TactiCats
description:
TactiCats is a pixel art multiplayer party-game that you can enjoy both with bots or your friends in local multiplayer mode.

Demo Features:

  • 4 unique cat skins
  • TDM and FFA modes with up to 3 friends or bots
  • 5 Maps
  • 4 Power-ups
  • Controller support (PS, Xbox, Joycon, Pro Controller)

Planned features:

  • Online Multiplayer
  • 10+ unlockable skins
  • 12+ Maps
  • 8 Power-ups
  • Achievements

Notes:

USB Joysticks are also supported, but some of the inputs are inverted.

Please report any bugs to hungrydingodev@gmail.com

#arcade #retro #action #multiplayer #pixelart #partygame #cat
